main event: Two unidentified objects were observed in Houston, Texas on 21 September 1954 for approximately 1 minute.
interesting points: The first object was possibly a reflection or a meteor,The second object appeared as a halo,Observers were driving at the time and may have had their view obstructed by their vehicle's motor,One object was estimated to be 40-50 feet in diameter and displayed maneuvers indicative of intelligent control,The sighting included one observer who did not see the first object while the second object was observed for longer.
